alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie; Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie; Inland Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 11:46PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Dixie and southeastern Taylor Counties through 1230 AM EDT... At 1145 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Steinhatchee. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Steinhatchee, Cross City, Horseshoe Point, Horseshoe Beach, Tennille, Shamrock, Hines, Jonesboro, Cross City Airport, Shired Island, Eugene and Jena. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Dixie; Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie; Inland Taylor
